text: Kabayan has to be one of my favourite Filipino places to eat. It's family friendly and the people there are very polite. The prices and the portions are very reasonable. I'll definitely be coming back!
Was there with brother earlier this week .. food portions were small .. selection was limited for 11am .. sinigang was salty .. service was slow

Newly Filipino store replaced Sinopino near Eglinton and Kennedy area. They have combos starting at 5.99 with one side and rice. Decent food for the price. They also offer catering services and hours are from 10:30am to 9pm at the time I asked.
